trans-unit.source: Provides the transition to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in a state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: Biedt de overgang naar een <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> in een werkstroom van de machine de status.
Deze klasse kan niet worden overgenomen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SetStateActivity can be used only in state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]De SetStateActivity kan alleen in status machine werkstromen worden gebruikt.

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity provides transitions only to leaf <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities (a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> that does not contain other <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities).
trans-unit.target: De SetStateActivity biedt overgangen alleen als u wilt bladeren <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>activiteiten (een <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>die geen andere <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>activiteiten).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity only provides transitions between two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes and does not support <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> to parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> transitions or any other combination.
trans-unit.target: De SetStateActivity biedt alleen transities tussen twee <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>klassen en biedt geen ondersteuning voor <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>bovenliggende <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>overgangen of een andere combinatie.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity has to be a leaf node within the activity tree of an event handler.
trans-unit.target: De SetStateActivity is geen leaf-knooppunt in de activiteitstructuur van een gebeurtenis-handler.

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one SetStateActivity but all the activities must be leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: Er is meer dan één SetStateActivity maar alle activiteiten moeten bladknooppunten.

trans-unit.source: SetStateActivity is always the last activity in the run path of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: SetStateActivity is altijd de laatste activiteit in het pad uitvoeren van een <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>activiteit.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"> </xref> klasse met de naam van de activiteit.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: De gebruiker gedefinieerde naam van de activiteit.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the target state.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van de naam van de doelstatus.

trans-unit.source: The name of the target stream.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> die is gericht de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName*>eigenschap.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName*>
